comment: Nov 14: Porzingis (rest) will not play against the Jazz on Thursday, Brad Rowland of the Locked On Podcast Network reports.

Nov 14: Head coach Rick Carlisle stated after Thursday's game against the Suns that Nesmith managed to avoid a serious injury, but he will miss some time, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.
Nov 10: Pacers coach Rick Carlisle said Sunday that Jones (back) is still a "ways out" from returning, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.
Oct 31: Toppin will undergo surgery to place a screw in his right foot Monday, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.
Jul 7: Haliburton will miss the entire 2025-26 season while recovering from surgery on his right Achilles tendon, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

Nov 13: Clippers president of basketball operations Lawrence Frank said Wednesday that Leonard is recovering from a right foot sprain in addition to the sprained right ankle he sustained in a Nov. 3 loss to the Heat, Ohm Youngmisuk of ESPN.com reports. "With Kawhi, it wasn't just an ankle sprain," Frank said. "He also had a significant sprain in his foot, as well. When he sprained his ankle, it kind of triggered a mechanism in his foot."
Nov 12: Beal will undergo season-ending surgery on his left hip, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
Nov 13: James was again able to get through full-contact, 5-on-5 work at Thursday's practice with the South Bay Lakers.
Nov 8: Vincent (ankle) has been ramping up his on-court work, but he still hasn't been cleared for 1-on-1, contact work, Law Murray of The Athletic reports.
Nov 14: Coward is doubtful for Saturday's game in Cleveland due to right foot soreness.
Nov 14: Small (toe) won't play in Saturday's game against Cleveland.

Nov 14: Anunoby has been ruled out for the remainder of Friday's game against the Heat due to a left hamstring strain.
